definition: Ithaca, Island state of Greece, the home of Odysseus 奧迪修斯|奥迪修斯/Ithaca NY, location of Cornell University 康奈爾|康奈尔

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Always keep Ithaca in your mind.
Ithaka gave you the GetWord("marvelous"); journey.
sentences.chinese: 伊薩卡給了你美麗的旅程。

sentences.english: Keep Ithaka always in your mind.
sentences.chinese: 總是把伊薩卡記在腦海裏。

sentences.english: Ithaka gave you the marvelous journey.
sentences.chinese: 伊薩卡給了你美麗的旅程。

sentences.english: And if you find her poor, Ithaca has not deceived you.
sentences.chinese: 倘如你發現她的貧瘠，伊薩卡並沒有欺騙你。

sentences.english: Thus Ithaca was a good island to live in.
sentences.chinese: 所以伊薩卡是一個適合居住的小島。

sentences.english: Bidding farewell to Ithaca and all that he held dear, he sailed away.
sentences.chinese: 他向伊薩卡和所有的親友告別，乘船而去。

sentences.english: Ithaca has given you the beautiful voyage.
sentences.chinese: 伊薩卡已經給予了你美麗的旅程。

sentences.english: And if you find her poor, Ithaka won't have fooled you.
sentences.chinese: 要是你發現她貧窮，伊薩卡就不曾欺騙你。
